description: Explore how NFTs are revolutionizing digital ownership in gaming, offering true ownership, interoperability, and new value paradigms, while also addressing challenges like environmental concerns and legal issues.
keywords: NFTs, gaming, digital ownership, blockchain, virtual assets, Axie Infinity, The Sandbox, Decentraland, environmental impact, play-to-earn, interoperability
title: The Rise of NFTs in Gaming: Revolutionizing Digital Ownership
